epics.title: Single-Page Checkout
epics.description: Consolidate the checkout process into a single, scrollable page to improve user experience and reduce cart abandonment.

stories.title: Implement single-page checkout layout
stories.description: Create a single-page layout for checkout with sections for cart summary, shipping information, payment method, and order review.
acceptance_criteria: Checkout process is on a single page
Page is responsive and fast
Cart summary is collapsible on mobile devices

agent_context.goal: Streamline the checkout process to enhance user experience and reduce abandonment rates.
self_check: Is the page load time under 2 seconds?
Does the layout adapt well to different screen sizes?

epics.title: Guest Checkout
epics.description: Enable users to complete purchases without creating an account to simplify the checkout process.

stories.title: Implement guest checkout feature
stories.description: Allow users to checkout without creating an account, requiring only an email address for order confirmation.
acceptance_criteria: Users can checkout without account creation
Email address is required for order confirmation
Option to create an account post-purchase with one click
Guest orders are stored and linked by email

agent_context.goal: Reduce friction in the checkout process by allowing purchases without mandatory account creation.
self_check: Is the email confirmation sent promptly?
Can users easily create an account post-purchase?

epics.title: Address Autocomplete
epics.description: Enhance user experience by implementing address autocomplete using Google Places API.

stories.title: Integrate Google Places API for address autocomplete
stories.description: Implement address autocomplete feature using Google Places API to support and validate international addresses.
acceptance_criteria: Address autocomplete is implemented using Google Places API
Supports international addresses
Validates addresses before submission
Displays 'We can't deliver here' for unsupported regions

agent_context.goal: Improve address entry accuracy and speed by providing autocomplete suggestions.
self_check: Does the autocomplete work for all major regions?

epics.title: Multiple Payment Methods
epics.description: Support a variety of payment options to enhance user convenience and flexibility.

stories.title: Implement multiple payment methods
stories.description: Support various payment options including credit/debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Klarna.
acceptance_criteria: Support for Visa, Mastercard, and Amex
Support for PayPal
Support for Apple Pay on Safari/iOS
Support for Google Pay on Chrome/Android
Support for Buy Now Pay Later with Klarna

agent_context.goal: Provide users with flexible payment options to increase conversion rates.
known_patterns: Use existing payment gateway integration patterns
self_check: Is the transaction completion time under 5 seconds?
Are all payment methods working seamlessly?

epics.title: Real-time Validation
epics.description: Enhance form usability by implementing real-time validation for checkout fields.

stories.title: Implement real-time form validation
stories.description: Validate form fields in real-time as the user types, showing inline errors.
acceptance_criteria: Email format is validated
Card number is validated using Luhn algorithm
Expiration date is validated to not be in the past
CVV is validated to be 3-4 digits
Shipping address completeness is validated
Inline errors are displayed

agent_context.goal: Improve user experience by providing immediate feedback on form input errors.
self_check: Are all validation rules correctly implemented?
Is the user experience smooth with real-time feedback?

epics.title: Order Summary and Promo Code Support
epics.description: Provide users with a detailed order summary and the ability to apply promo codes.

stories.title: Display detailed order summary
stories.description: Show an itemized order summary including product details, pricing, and totals.
acceptance_criteria: Displays product thumbnails, names, and quantities
Shows individual prices and line totals
Displays subtotal, shipping cost, tax, discount codes, and grand total

agent_context.goal: Provide transparency and clarity on order details to users.
known_patterns: Use existing UI components for displaying lists
self_check: Does the summary update dynamically with changes?

stories.title: Implement promo code functionality
stories.description: Allow users to enter promo codes and see the discount applied to their order.
acceptance_criteria: Single input field for promo code with 'Apply' button
Displays success/error message
Shows discount amount
Supports percentage and fixed discounts
Validates code server-side

agent_context.goal: Encourage purchases by allowing users to apply promotional discounts.
self_check: Are both percentage and fixed discounts supported?
Is the promo code validation secure and efficient?
